ComicInfo.Summary:
This week’s zarjaz line-up in the Galaxy’s Greatest includes: Judge Dredd: The Beating by John Wagner, Patrick Goddard, Adam Brown, and Annie Parkhouse; Defoe: The London Hanged by Pat Mills, Leigh Gallagher, and Annie Parkhouse; Terror Tales: Why Did The Priest Cross The Road? By David Baillie, Paul Marshall, and Ellie De Ville; Bad Company: First Casualties by Peter Milligan, Rufus Dayglo, Jim McCarthy, and Simon Bowland.
Cover: Brendan McCarthy
Judge Dredd - The Beating (Part 3) (John Wagner - Patrick Goddard)Bad Company - First Casualties (Part 11) (Peter Milligan - Rufus Dayglo and Jim McCarthy)Terror Tales - Why Did the Priest Cross the Road? (David Baillie - Paul Marshall)Defoe - The London Hanged (Part 11) (Pat Mills - Leigh Gallagher)
